Episodes.Title: Angelina's New Home
Episodes.Plot: Angelina is having a hard time adjusting to her family's move to the other side of Chipping Cheddar and decides to take matters into her own hands.

Episodes.Title: Angelina's New School
Episodes.Plot: Angelina is excited, yet nervous, about her first day of school. When she finds her other classmates proficient in other styles of dance, she tries to imitate what they are doing but without success.

Episodes.Title: Angelina's New Ballet Teacher
Episodes.Plot: The day for Angelina to meet her new ballet teacher, Ms. Mimi, has finally arrived and Angelina is thrilled.

Episodes.Title: Angelina's Dance Partner
Episodes.Plot: Angelina is ecstatic to have the opportunity to dance with her best friend, Alice, at Camembert Academy's "Dance With a Partner Day."

Episodes.Title: Angelina's Gift for Ms Mimi
Episodes.Plot: It's Ms. Mimi's birthday, and Angelina wants to give her the best birthday, ever.

Episodes.Title: Angelina's Oldest Friend
Episodes.Plot: Angelina loves her new Camembert Academy friends and also loves her old friend Alice. She is certain they will all become best friends and invites everyone to her home for a play date.

Episodes.Title: Angelina And The Hip Hop Kid
Episodes.Plot: There's a new mouseling at Camembert Academy named AZ and he loves to dance hip hop. The girls find him and his dance moves interesting, but they don't want him for a ballet partner.

Episodes.Title: Angelina And The Broken Fiddle
Episodes.Plot: When Angelina and Polly accidentally break their dad's fiddle after ignoring a household rule, they come up with elaborate excuses to get out of trouble.

Episodes.Title: Angelina And Alice's Big Night
Episodes.Plot: Angelina has a recital coming up with her class at Camembert and she wants Alice to attend as her special guest.

Episodes.Title: Angelina And The Giant
Episodes.Plot: Angelina and Alice have been given the task of designing the giant prop for Jackie and the Beanstalk.
Episodes.ParentalRatingReason: Lightbox Provisional Classification. Official NZ Rating To Be Confirmed.

Episodes.Title: Angelina's Musical Day
Episodes.Plot: Angelina and her friends are putting on a production of "Peter and the Wolf" where each character is identified by a musical riff played on a character specific instrument.

Episodes.Title: Angelina's Crazy Solo
Episodes.Plot: Angelina and her friends are putting on a show, and they each have a specific job they must perform in the show.

Episodes.Title: Angelina And The Irish Jig
Episodes.Plot: Vici just returned from a holiday in Tippermousy, Ireland. She's excited to teach her friends about Irish music and how to dance an Irish jig.

Episodes.Title: Angelina En Pointe
Episodes.Plot: The Mouskinov Ballet is holding auditions for their next show and even though the show needs much older dancers, Angelina does whatever she can do to try out.

Episodes.Title: Angelina's Rock Band
Episodes.Plot: At the Chipping Cheddar Music Day Picnic, Angelina finds her friends rehearsing in a band for a school project. They invite her to join in as the tambourine player.

Episodes.Title: Angelina's Lost Ice Skates
Episodes.Plot: Angelina joins a band, but her enthusiasm fades because she doesn't have much to do; Angelina loses her ice skates when she's supposed to take part in a big show with Alice, and they have to retrace their steps to find them.

Episodes.Title: Angelina And The New Music Store
Episodes.Plot: Angelina celebrates the opening of her dad's new music shop; Ms. Mimi admonishes Angelina for talking in class.

Episodes.Title: Angelina And Ms Mimi
Episodes.Plot: Angelina celebrates the opening of her dad's new music shop; Ms. Mimi admonishes Angelina for talking in class.

Episodes.Title: Angelina And Super Polly
Episodes.Plot: After reading a book about a mouseling with superhero powers, Polly thinks she might have special abilities too.
